org.switchyard

Interface Exchange


  • public interface Exchange
    An Exchange represents an instance of a service invocation with a specific message exchange pattern (e.g. InOnly, InOut). Exchange provides a conduit for the messages that flow into and out of a service as part of a service invocation. Unlike messages, an exchange cannot be copied and reused across service invocations. State associated with an invocation (i.e. context) is maintained at the exchange level.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONTENT_TYPE
      Context property name used for Message Content Type.
      static String FAULT_TYPE
      Context property name used for Fault Type.
      static String MESSAGE_ID
      Context property name used for Message ID.
      static String OPERATION_NAME
      Context property name used for Operation Name.
      static String PROPAGATE_EXCEPTION_ON_IN_ONLY
      Domain property name used for a boolean flag which indicates if the exception should be propagate back to the service consumer.
      static String RELATES_TO
      Context property name used for Relates To.
      static String ROLLBACK_ON_FAULT
      Context property name used for A boolean flag which indicates if the transaction should be rolled back or not on fault.
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      Context property name used for Service Name.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        Context getContext()
        Retrieves the exchange context.
        Returns:
        the exchange context

      • getContext

        Context getContext(Message message)
        Retrieves context available for passed message. If message is same as message available on this exchange it will return same context as getContext() method, otherwise another instance of Context will be returned.
        Parameters:
        message - Message instance.
        Returns:
        Context for message.

      • getConsumer

        ServiceReference getConsumer()
        Get the service reference representing the consumer.
        Returns:
        The consumer service reference instance.

      • getProvider

        Service getProvider()
        Get the service representing the provider. This method will return null before an exchange is sent for the first time.
        Returns:
        the provider's service

      • getContract

        ExchangeContract getContract()
        The contract between consumer and provider for this exchange.
        Returns:
        exchange contract

      • consumer

        Exchange consumer(ServiceReference consumer,
                ServiceOperation operation)
        Set service consumer info for this exchange.
        Parameters:
        consumer - the service reference used by the exchange
        operation - the operation being invoked
        Returns:
        this Exchange instance

      • provider

        Exchange provider(Service provider,
                ServiceOperation operation)
        Set service provider info for this exchange.
        Parameters:
        provider - the service provider used by the exchange
        operation - the operation being invoked
        Returns:
        this Exchange instance

      • getMessage

        Message getMessage()
        Returns the current message for the exchange. On new exchanges, this method will always return null. The current message reference is updated with each call to send().
        Returns:
        the current message for the exchange

      • createMessage

        Message createMessage()
        Create a message to be used with this exchange.
        Returns:
        new message

      • send

        void send(Message message)
        Sends the specified message as part of this message exchange.

        Implementations must throw an IllegalStateException if this method is called when the Exchange state is in ExchangeState.FAULT.

        Parameters:
        message - message to send

      • sendFault

        void sendFault(Message message)
        Sends the specified message as part of this message exchange.

        Also sets the Exchange state to ExchangeState.FAULT.

        Parameters:
        message - message to send

      • getState

        ExchangeState getState()
        Get the exchange state.
        Returns:
        The exchange State.

      • getPhase

        ExchangePhase getPhase()
        Get the exchange phase.
        Returns:
        the exchange phase

      • getReplyHandler

        ExchangeHandler getReplyHandler()
        Get the reply handler for this exchange.
        Returns:
        reply handler

      • getPattern

        ExchangePattern getPattern()
        Provides the consumer's view of the message exchange pattern. This method is equivalent to getContract().getConsumerOperation().getExchangePattern(). Note that if consumer information has not been set, this method will return null!
        Returns:
        the consumer's exchange pattern or null if no consumer info is set on the exchange

      • getSecurity

        ExchangeSecurity getSecurity()
        Get the exchange security.
        Returns:
        the exchange security
